text.config.delvedarknessconfig.title: Delve Darkness Config
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.d:
Whether or not the skulk 'Darkness' effect modifies the darkness calculations.
While the 'Darkness' effect is applied to you, your current light level requirement is raised by 8.
Volume control for the darkness sound effect.

How damage is dealt to the player.
Flat settings will be disabled when Levels is in use and vice versa.
How long in seconds you can stay in darkness before damage starts.
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.l: At which light level do you start taking damage.
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.g: After spawning, how many seconds of extra immunity you get.
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.f: The flat damage you take every second when you run out of darkness immunity.
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.l: Multiplies the damage you take by this number.
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.f: Enables this section. When not in effect, darkness damage is based on the darkness levels config section.
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.option.l: The minimum damage you can take from darkness
The maximum damage you can take from darkness
text.config.delvedarknessconfig.category: Settings for the levels damage type
Settings for the flat damage type
